qas.question: What type of exhibition game showcases the best players?
What are exhibition games in the Olympics?
What can an exhibition game raise money for?
What can an exhibition game settle?
What type of exhibition game showcases average players?
What type of game do national competitions to demonstrate a sport?

plausible_answers.text: pit participants from two different leagues or countries

qas.question: How is the official determination of who is the best in the world made?
What type of game is used to provide immature entertainment?

context: <b7_0>An exhibition game<b7_0/> may also be used to settle <a3_0>a challenge<a3_0/>, to provide professional entertainment, to promote the sport, or to raise money for <a2_0>charities<a2_0/>. Several sports leagues hold <a0_0><b4_0>all-star games<b4_0/><a0_0/> to showcase their best players against each other, while other exhibitions games may <b6_0>pit participants from two different leagues or countries<b6_0/> to unofficially determine who would be the best in the world. International competitions like the Olympic Games may also hold <b5_0>exhibition games<b5_0/> as part of <a1_0>a demonstration sport<a1_0/>.
